attributes.action: introduce paganism into school curriculum to encourage the growing tolerant tone of education.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As it stands the three major faith groups of Christianity,Islam and Judaism take chief role in the classroom, with cursory mentions of others such as buddhism and hindi.
However PAGANISM and in particular wicca are among the fastest growing faiths in the UK. With its harmonious attitude to all peoples, beliefs and respect of the natural world, surely it could provide a wonderful example to children?
At present there is no official line of inclusion for wicca, and it's time we proved we are over foolish superstitions and hollywood ideas of the craft and allow it due recognition.
